q1: What types of differences does it detect?
a1: It detects added properties, removed properties, and changed values at any nesting depth in the JSON structure.
a2: Yes, arrays are compared element by element, detecting additions, removals, and changes at each index.
q3: Can I compare large JSON files?
a3: Yes, but very large files (>1MB) may take a moment to process. The tool handles typical API responses and configs easily.
